name: Nomad: Primetime

.

---

NOMAD: PRIMETIME

An NES style top-down action adventure made in 9 days. A reimagining of the first game we ever made as a team. Enjoy!

---

note: we know the screen transitions are subject to breaking. just keep moving in the direction of the transition (hold the move key during the transition) and it should behave. we'll fix that asap..

--

.

WASD - Move

J - A    (Basic Attack)

K - B    (Use Ability)

L - Select    (Switch Abilities)

Enter - Start
